page.title: 03LAND USE
page.content: This area consists of 2 differing types of land use. The square C1 is mostly residential. It also contains most of the recreational land and facilities in Horwich.These are Horwich Leisure Centre & Swimming Pool,Horwich R.M.I.football stadium,Horwich Cricket club ground,Horwich Golf Club and Station Park with its all weather floodlit football pitch. The square B1 consists of rough grazing land.There is also the remains of some industry. The old Pipe works site can still be seen,an old dried out reservior thought to have been used for the pipe works.There are various disused quarries which provided local stone for building.
